[_805 21st St NW #400, Washington, DC 20052_](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//school+of+media+and+public+affairs/data=!4m6!4m5!1m1!4e2!1m2!1m1!1s0x89b7b7b08af3296f:0x3e32dedd82d144b3?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjhzKDZsKOCAxVauIkEHfzUD4YQ9Rd6BAhOEAA)

::: {.callout-note appearance="default" title="Guided Python Project released"}
Guided-Python Project on **COVID-19 Data Analysis** is <u>_released_</u>, the project files are available under **Week 4**.

**NOTE**: This is an individual project and it is due on **November 10, 2023** by 11:59 PM. Please [review](summary-policy.qmd) important information on university polices on collaboration among students before submitting your course deliverables.
:::
